page.title: 02THE PARISH
page.content:
History has left few famous marks on the Parish of{Buckland Tout Saints.} It is a quiet part of the{South Hams} with two hamlets,a small Post Office, and an Hotel.A former manor house is now a Centre for Outdoor Activities and there is a small Caravan Site at its western edge.What was the main Turnpike road connecting Kingsbridge and Totnes winds through it passing the many farms.Most people pass through it without stopping unless they happen to be a 'local'. Unnoticed as it is though,it has a history all of its own that tells of the lives,successes and tradgedies of how people lived in the past.
Ref. Buckland Tout Saints-a Parish History. P.Cove
